label: 承和の変
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 2:  Heian Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1999
説明文: The events surrounding the crown prince's removal from office, which marked the beginning of the end of imperial rule in Japan.  The emperor remained an important and sometimes controlling force at court into the tenth century, but the main focus of political interest after 842 is the rise to power of the Northern House of the Fujiwara (p. 36).
